params.name: awsRegionId
params.label: AWS Region
params.description: AWS region id. Leave empty to use region of current instance

params.name: emrVersion
params.label: EMR Version
params.description: EMR release label, e.g. 5.23.0

params.name: ebsRootVolumeSize
params.label: Root volume size
params.description: Root device EBS volume size in GB, or 0 to use default size. Must be <= 100.

params.name: ebsOptimized
params.label: Use optimized EBS volumes
params.description: Applies to all instance groups

params.name: tags
params.label: Tags
params.description: AWS tags to add on the cluster

params.name: logsPath
params.label: Path for logs
params.description: Set specific S3 path where logs will be stored. Optional.

params.name: terminationProtected
params.label: Termination protection
params.description: Prevents accidental cluster termination.

params.name: pythonLibs
params.label: Python libs to install (Advanced)
params.description: Python libraries to install on each node. Use the same formatting as a pip requirements.txt file.

params.name: extraSetup
params.label: Extra setup commands (Advanced)
params.description: Shell commands (set paths or create dirs, for example) to run on each node

params.name: softwareConfig
params.label: Software configurations
params.description: Specify desired software config settings as a JSON list of properties. Leave empty to use default EMR settings. For more info, see https://docs.aws.amazon.com/emr/latest/ReleaseGuide/emr-configure-apps.html.

params.name: masterInstanceType
params.label: Instance type
params.description: EC2 instance type. Mandatory.

params.name: masterEbsSize
params.label: EBS storage size (GB)
params.description: Storage size for each EBS volume. Must be b/w 10 and 1024.

params.name: masterEbsCount
params.label: EBS volume count
params.description: Number of EBS volumes.

params.name: coreInstanceType
params.label: Instance type
params.description: Instance type for the CORE instance group (compute + storage slave nodes). Mandatory.

params.name: coreInstanceCount
params.label: Instance count
params.description: Number of instances (must be >= 1).

params.name: coreEbsSize
params.label: EBS volume size (GB).
params.description: EBS volume size per instance instance. Must be b/w 10 and 1024.

params.name: coreEbsCount
params.label: EBS volume count
params.description: Number of EBS volumes per instance

params.name: coreUseSpotInstances
params.label: Use spot instances
params.description: Spot instances are cheaper, but can be terminated without warning. Not recommended for CORE group.

params.name: coreBidPrice
params.label: Bid price (per instance)
params.description: Max hourly rate (price) you are willing to pay per instance. Leave blank or set to 0 use on-demand price.

params.name: taskInstanceType
params.label: Instance type
params.description: Instance type for the TASK instance group (compute-only slave nodes).

params.name: taskInstanceCount
params.label: Instance count
params.description: Number of instances. Set to 0 if no task instances are desired.

params.name: taskEbsSize
params.label: EBS volume size (GB).
params.description: EBS volume size per instance. Must be b/w 10 and 1024.

params.name: taskEbsCount
params.label: EBS volume count
params.description: Number of EBS volumes per instance

params.name: taskUseSpotInstances
params.label: Use spot instances
params.description: Spot instances are cheaper, but can be terminated without warning

params.name: taskBidPrice
params.label: Bid price (per task instance)
params.description: Max hourly rate (price) you are willing to pay per instance. Leave blank or set to 0 to use on-demand price.

params.name: subnetId
params.label: VPC subnet id
params.description: VPC subnet (e.g., subnet-XXXXXX) in which the cluster must be deployed. Leave empty to use that of the current instance.

params.name: additionalSecurityGroups
params.label: Additional security groups
params.description: Optional. Comma-separated list of security groups ids to add to the nodes

params.name: ec2KeyName
params.label: Key pair name
params.description: Optional but recommended. Name of SSH keypair to add on the cluster nodes.

params.name: serviceRole
params.label: Service role
params.description: IAM role to attach to the service. Must have ability to call mandatory AWS services to create the cluster.

params.name: nodesRole
params.label: Nodes role
params.description: IAM role to attach to the nodes of the cluster. Needs to have ability to call mandatory AWS services from the cluster, like S3

params.name: metastoreMySQLHost
params.label: DB host
params.description: Hostname of the MySQL or Aurora host

params.name: metastoreMySQLUser
params.label: DB user
params.description: Username of the MySQL or Aurora DB

params.name: metastoreMySQLPassword
params.label: DB password
params.description: Password of the MySQL or Aurora DB

params.name: metastoreJDBCURL
params.label: Metastore JDBC URL
params.description: JDBC URL of the metastore database

params.name: metastoreJDBCDriver
params.label: Metastore JDBC Driver
params.description: Optional. JDBC Driver of the metastore database

params.name: metastoreJDBCUser
params.label: Metastore JDBC User
params.description: Optional. JDBC user of the metastore database

params.name: metastoreJDBCPassword
params.label: Metastore JDBC password
params.description: Optional. JDBC password of the metastore database

params.name: databasesToCreate
params.label: Databases to create
params.description: Comma-separated list of databases to create upon startup
